page.title: 02Introduction
page.content: Our school is Hamsteels Primary.We learn together.We play inside and outside together.Outside we play hopscotch,cat and mouse,netball and the boys play football and cricket. We all work together in the same building.Some of our school meals are nice but others are not.It would be better if the heating was on when it is cold I like reading books at school.We do many interesting subjects at school.All the staff in the school are kind and help us when we are in trouble.Our headteacher is Mr.Roberts.I like P.E.,gymnastics and maths.I also like going to Esh Winning library.I do not like goimg out to play when it is freezing.Our day starts at 9 o,clock and we finish at 3.15.Our dinner only lasts for 45 minutes I wish it was longer.l
